name: REAL Bighorn Sheep Hunting Calls - 8 Bighorn Sheep CALLS & Bighorn Sheep Sounds! - (ad free) BLUETOOTH COMPATIBLE
name_original: REAL Bighorn Sheep Hunting Calls - 8 Bighorn Sheep CALLS & Bighorn Sheep Sounds! - (ad free) BLUETOOTH COMPATIBLE
description:
The REAL Bighorn Sheep Hunting Calls app provides you bighorn sheep calls at your fingertips. These bighorn sheep sounds are clear, crisp, lifelike and recorded from REAL bighorn sheep. 8 bighorn sheep call soundtracks included. Simply connect the app to any Bluetooth speaker and you have an instant bighorn sheep electronic caller system to use (where legal).

FEATURES:
- 8 bighorn sheep hunting calls
- Effective, realistic and clear audio to bring in bighorn sheep
- Bluetooth compatible to sync to a Bluetooth speaker in the field
- Sounds can play in the background of your phone allowing you to text, take pictures and surf the internet without disrupting the bighorn sheep calling sounds
- Long soundtracks allow you to set the call and focus on bighorn sheep hunting
- Connect to your speaker system with audio cables or Bluetooth (cables not included)
- No more forgetting to grab your MP3 player or memory cards, you always have your phone with you
- E-Calling audio for bighorn sheep at a fraction of the cost of purchasing multiple soundtracks and memory cards separately

Soundtracks included in “REAL Bighorn Sheep Hunting Calls"
- Bighorn head butting
- Ram in rut
- Bighorn sheep bleat
- Bighorn sheep baa
- Baby bighorn sheep
- Baby bighorn sheep distress
- Bighorn sheep herd
- Bighorn sheep distress

Download “REAL Bighorn Sheep Hunting Calls” and start having bighorn sheep hunting success today!
